default.name: Username/Password Reminder Request
default.msg: This is an optional menu item for accessing Community Builder Username/Password reminder. Normally not needed, as you would normally use Community Builder login module for this so it adapts automatically to login state.

state.name: Community Builder Username/Password Reminder Request
state.description: This is an optional menu item for accessing Community Builder Username/Password reminder. Normally not needed, as you would normally use Community Builder login module for this so it adapts automatically to login state.
